alert.note: Alert for Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 10 at 2:34AM MST until December 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM EARLY MONDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches possible around the Oracle area. * WHERE...Southeast Pinal County. * WHEN...From early Monday morning through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels around 4000 feet at times possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle
